title: Someone Teach me How to carry
body:
Can somebody please teach me how to carry games.
I play pretty well in my games but im obviously not good enough because i don't win games, i just need to know/learn how to 1v9 and win games because that seems to be the only way to win as teamplay is impossible :(

replies.body: Sometimes the best way to carry, is to let someone else carry. Trying to carry when you can't carry, is really just feeding.

Stop trying to carry, for a start.

Everyone who has this "I MUST CARRY" mentality typically either feeds or runs down lane to killtrade, ignoring objectives and farm.
Play Trynda and splitpush the crap outta enemy team.

> [{quoted}](name=SonicMaster02,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Gwb8m3c1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-16T19:32:32.285+0000)
>
> Play Trynda and splitpush the crap outta enemy team.


this

Play Yi. Highest pentaill rating in all ranks. Then there is Nasus, Tryndamere, Mordekaiser, Yorick, Jax......... We will just say top laners except Shen pretty much can just shove down their lane. Normally with Mordekaiser i have top turret down in roughly 8 minutes, depending on the enemy ofcourse..... Enemy jungler camping top tends to happen too, but that just results in a double kill (again depending on the match up).... His only real downfall is if the enemy top has a lot of range lol

pick tahm kench

press w on a teamate

throw into enemy turret




now u can carry anyone on ur team :)
